attributes.action: engage in serious discussions with Africans that are already here, about issues in the continent and how they can achive true democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some of us are asylum seeker by titles,but where we come from we are heros for the fact that we fled our countries bearing the word that not all is well and we've paid the price.just that fact alone matters most to the people that we left behind and that they will never cease to become our people and whilst we here we shall do ev'fing in our strengths to free them from evil and persecution.But now that now seems a lie because im persecuted myself here in the uk and can't do what i promised.....do you feel me knocking?
